column4: Anyone know if a AMD64 version of wine exists for Ubuntu (DD)? I've looked all over and I've turned up no working (i.e. works for a noob like me) solutions.
It doesn't exist, use the normal one in 32bit mode
It won't even let  me get the package for wine though (using synaptic)
I would recommend just using the 32bit version of ubuntu, it is pretty much the same >_>
